incidents.violation_type:
• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
• On the morning of 07/30/ 2021, the Israeli occupation forces allowed the expansion of the marine fishing area from 9 nautical miles to 12 nautical miles.
• The occupation forces violated the cease-fire agreement by launching 17 missiles during successive air strikes targeting sites belonging to the Palestinian armed groups in the governorates of North Gaza, Gaza, and Central Gaza.
• A child died of his serious wounds sustained in an air strike in the central governorate, during the aggression on the Gaza Strip last year.
•Palestinian armed groups violated the ceasefire agreement by launching 3 projectiles toward the Green Line (one of which landed inside the Gaza Strip).
violation_descriptions:
• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.

• The occupation forces violated the cease-fire agreement by launching 17 missiles during successive air strikes targeting sites belonging to the Palestinian armed groups in the governorates of North Gaza, Gaza, and Central Gaza.
• A child died of his serious wounds sustained in an air strike in the central governorate, during the aggression on the Gaza Strip last year.
•Palestinian armed groups violated the ceasefire agreement by launching 3 projectiles toward the Green Line (one of which landed inside the Gaza Strip).

* Beit Hanoun crossing - “Erez”: On 01/26/ 2023, it is partially open (for the passage of humanitarian cases, foreign journalists, workers of international humanitarian organizations, merchants, businessmen and travelers through the Al-Karama Crossing “Allenby” - previously coordinated for them).
At dawn on 01/27/2023, Israeli warplanes launched a missile, targeting a site belonging to a Palestinian armed group, east of the town of Beit Hanoun.
At dawn on 01/27/2023, members of the Palestinian armed groups launched 3 projectiles towards the Green Line (one of them fell inside the Gaza Strip).

* Al-Muntar-Karni crossing: closed since 02/03/2011, permanently and by a unilateral Israeli decision.
* Shejaiya Crossing - “Nahal Oz” for fuel: closed since 04. 01. 2010, by unilateral Israeli decision.

incidents.violation_type:
• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
• On the morning of 07/30/ 2021, the Israeli occupation forces allowed the expansion of the marine fishing area from 9 nautical miles to 12 nautical miles.
• The occupation forces violated the ceasefire agreement by firing from their positions on the Green Line towards the Gaza and Central Gaza governorates.

• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.

• The occupation forces violated the ceasefire agreement by firing from their positions on the Green Line towards the Gaza and Central Gaza governorates.

* Beit Hanoun crossing - “Erez”: On 01/27/ 2023, it is partially open (for the passage of humanitarian cases, foreign journalists, workers of international humanitarian organizations, merchants, businessmen and travelers through the Al-Karama Crossing “Allenby” - previously coordinated for them).

* Al-Muntar-Karni crossing: closed since 02/03/2011, permanently and by a unilateral Israeli decision.
* Shejaiya Crossing - “Nahal Oz” for fuel: closed since 04. 01. 2010, by unilateral Israeli decision.

incidents.violation_type:
• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
• On the morning of 07/30/ 2021, the Israeli occupation forces allowed the expansion of the marine fishing area from 9 nautical miles to 12 nautical miles.
• The occupation forces violated the cease-fire, by firing from their positions on the Green Line in Rafah Governorate, by gunboats firing at fishermen's boats while chasing them at sea in the North Gaza Governorate, and by air strikes with 5 missiles (in two successive raids) in the Gaza and Central governorates and as a result killed a civilian.
A citizen succumbed to his serious injuries in North Gaza Governorate.
• Palestinian armed groups violated the ceasefire agreement by firing 6 mortar shells towards the Green Line.
